name: REFLECTION (itch) (kaanxx, irembuyuksahin, artshenur, AceofSpades70, NaoNM)
description:

Controls: 

  • Move: A/D
  • Interaction: E 
  • Mini Game : Space

Summary:

Seeing that someone new has moved into the neighborhood, Beth wants to visit them. When she sees that the neighbor's house is better than her own and that the neighbor is more beautiful, she got jealous and wants to be like her. She sees the neighbor's comb in the bathroom and likes it very much and tries to steal it, but she can't. The next day, Beth decides to go to Betty's house and steal all of her belongings when she is not home.

When she stole all of her belongings, Betty caught her on action and Beth decided to stole her life and beauty with killing her. She looked at the mirror expecting she would see herself as Betty in the mirror, instead she saw herself.
